DOC.brief_summary: Despite exercise training decrease blood pressure 'average ' term , wide interindividual variability exercise training , yet unknown mode exercise ( e.g . endurance , strength , concurrent , high intensity interval training ) produce more/less non-responder ( NR ) prevalence ( i.e. , percentage subject experience non-change/worsened response training outcome ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Despite exercise training decrease blood pressure 'average ' term , wide interindividual variability exercise training , yet unknown mode exercise ( e.g . endurance , strength , concurrent , high intensity interval training ) produce more/less non-responder ( NR ) prevalence ( i.e. , percentage subject experience non-change/worsened response training outcome ) .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent ; Interested improve health fitness ; Systolic blood pressure > 120 mmHg < 140 mmHg , and/or DBP ≥ 80 < 90 mmHg accord standard classification ; No drug therapy previous 3 month ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 35 kg/m2 ) ; ( c ) physically inactive ( accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire previously validate Chilean population ) Normal /mild alter lipid profile ( total cholesterol [ TC ] ~200 ≤250 mg/dL , lowdensity lipid [ LDLC ] ~140 mg/dL ≤200 mg/dL , highdensity lipid [ HDLC ] ≥20 ~40 mg/dL , triglyceride ~150 ≤250 mg/dL ) accord standard classification . Cardiovascular contraindication exercise history stroke ; Asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ; Musculoskeletal disorder low back pain ; Smokers last 3 month include study .
